Deck Directory

Gardevoir ex

Copied!
This is a combination of a lot of Japanese Gardevoir lists. Gardevoir loses Refinement, but it doesn't lose everything. Notably, it gains Clefairy, which allows it to hit for weakness on Dragapult and Raging Bolt. The deck now also leans a lot more on Research to get those Psychic energy into the discard and cuts the TM Evolution since you don't really want Kirlias on your board.
3× Ralts
2× Kirlia
2× Gardevoir ex
2× Munkidori
1× Budew
1× Klefki
1× Drifloon
1× Scream Tail
1× Mew ex
1× Lillie's Clefairy ex 📷
1× Fezandipiti ex
4× Iono
3× Professor's Research
2× Arven
1× Boss's Orders
4× Buddy-Buddy Poffin
3× Ultra Ball
2× Nest Ball
4× Night Stretcher
3× Rare Candy
2× Counter Catcher
1× Earthen Vessel
1× Brilliant Blender
3× Bravery Charm
2× Artazon
7× Psychic Energy
2× Darkness Energy
